tutorial.text: Let's get to the first order of business. You have to decide on a location for your new business. I found this run down place in the outskirts of the city. Not pretty. But everyone starts small. Should we move in?

responses.text: Too bad. You don't have enough money to afford anything else. So we're taking this place anyway.
Perfect. It'll need some work, but I'm sure it'll be fun!

tutorial.text: Now, let's decide on the kind of business we want to run. For someone just starting out, I recommend to open a caf√©. Do you like coffee?

responses.text: Really? You don't like coffee? I guess we have to hire someone who does. Otherwise you'll most likely serve horrible coffee.
Me too!

tutorial.text: Here is a barister with absolutely no experience. I think with the amount of money we have we can't be picky. Should we hire him?

responses.text: I guess you'll try making coffee yourself then. Not sure if that's a good idea.
Our first employee. Let's be nice.

tutorial.text: I think we are ready for opening, now. What do you think?

responses.text: No? Hm. Not sure what you're waiting for then.
How exciting!

space_cafe.text: Grey. Lot's of grey rocks. Other than that... nothing. Should we build our restaurant in one of those big craters?

responses.text: Not a crater. Alright. Let's build it right here then.
I think that was a wise choice. craters offer protection against asteroids.

space_cafe.text: Alright. Your restaurant is all set up and ready to go. Now, we wait for customers. Do you see any?

responses.text: They will come. I'm sure. We basically have the monopoly on this planet.
Liar. But I guess being an optimistic visionary is a good thing for entrpeneurs.

space_cafe.text: So it's been some days and we still haven't seen any customers. I wonder if we should change something. Should we put up billboards?

responses.text: If we just wait long enough, we might get some customers you think? Ok.
Great! Let's see if we get some attention.

space_cafe.text: What's that?! A Tesla is floating towards our drive through! Could that be our first customer?

responses.text: Don't be so pessimistic! The car actually stopped and we got our first customer!
Woohoo! You're right! Our first order! How exciting. I'm sure word is getting out now.

space_cafe.text: A group of small green people walked in. They don't seem human. Should we serve them anyway?

responses.text: These little guys seem particularly happy.

space_cafe.text: Not sure anyone will ever show up... Don't you think?

space_cafe__asteroids.text: A big asteroid is coming closer and closer! Are you gonna risk your life protecting your business?

vacation.text: Seems like you're enjoying yourself with some cocktails in the warm sun of the Carribean. Do you want to go back yet?

responses.text: Yea let's get you some more of those cocktails.
Duty calls!

vacation.text: Another wonderful day on the beach. Maybe you want to think about coming home. What do you think?

responses.text: Can't get enough of that beach?
Alright. Next stop: Home. Welcome back!

vacation.text: You seem very well rested out here in the sun. Is it time to go back to work yet?

responses.text: Who am I kidding. Of course not!
Time to become reasonable.
